body_html:
Steve, thanks for the contribution! We'll check internally that we have someone who has cycles to maintain this function on our side. If we do, we can accept it. Keep in mind that code like this should be added to tf.contrib first, and not core. If we decide that we can accept it, you'll have to move it to somewhere in contrib (perhaps tf.contrib.losses is the appropriate module)
…
On Mon, Jan 9, 2017 at 10:23 AM, drpngx ***@***.***> wrote: @ebrevdo <https://github.com/ebrevdo> want to take a look? — You are receiving this because you were mentioned. body:
Steve, thanks for the contribution!  We'll check internally that we have
someone who has cycles to maintain this function on our side.  If we do, we
can accept it.

Keep in mind that code like this should be added to tf.contrib first, and
not core.  If we decide that we can accept it, you'll have to move it to
somewhere in contrib (perhaps tf.contrib.losses is the appropriate module)

On Mon, Jan 9, 2017 at 10:23 AM, drpngx <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> @ebrevdo <https://github.com/ebrevdo> want to take a look?
>
> —
